verses.roman:
jagannātha dekhi' sabāra ha-ila ānanda
bhāvete āviṣṭa hailā prabhu nityānanda

synonyms: jagannātha dekhi'-seeing Lord Jagannātha; sabāra—of everyone; ha-ila—there was; ānanda—pleasure; bhāvete—in ecstasy; āviṣṭa—overwhelmed; hailā—became; prabhu nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda.
translation: Everyone was then very pleased to see the Deity of Lord Jagannātha. Lord Nityānanda in particular was overwhelmed with ecstasy.
